laboratory_examinations.findings: Visual acuity in the right eye was 20/400; left eye 20/30. The left fundus showed large soft drusen larger than 125µm, mild pigmentary mottling, but no evidence of subretinal fluid or hemorrhage.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: His visual acuity in the right eye initially showed some interval improvement but has ultimately worsened to “count fingers” vision.
